member.name: T:VL.ImGui.Widgets.NewLine
member.summary: Undo a SameLine or force a new line when in an horizontal-layout context.

member.name: T:VL.ImGui.Widgets.SameLine
member.summary: Call between widgets or groups to layout them horizontally. X position given in window coordinates.

member.name: T:VL.ImGui.Widgets.SetCursorPosition
member.summary: Cursor position in window coordinates (relative to window position)

member.name: T:VL.ImGui.Widgets.SetCursorPosY
member.summary: Cursor position in window coordinates (relative to window position)

member.name: T:VL.ImGui.Widgets.SetCursorPosX
member.summary: Cursor position in window coordinates (relative to window position)

member.name: T:VL.ImGui.Widgets.SetCursorScreenPosition
member.summary: Cursor position in window coordinates (relative to window position)

member.name: T:VL.ImGui.Widgets.Spacing
member.summary: Add vertical spacing.

member.name: T:VL.ImGui.Widgets.SetScrollFromPosX
member.summary: Adjust scrolling amount to make current cursor position visible.

member.name: P:VL.ImGui.Widgets.SetScrollFromPosX.Ratio
member.summary: 0.0 - Left, 0.5 - Center, 1.0 - Right.

member.name: T:VL.ImGui.Widgets.SetScrollFromPosY
member.summary: Adjust scrolling amount to make current cursor position visible.

member.name: P:VL.ImGui.Widgets.SetScrollFromPosY.Ratio
member.summary: 0.0 - Top, 0.5 - Center, 1.0 - Bottom.

member.name: T:VL.ImGui.Widgets.SetScrollHereX
member.summary: Adjust scrolling amount to make current cursor position visible.

member.name: P:VL.ImGui.Widgets.SetScrollHereX.Ratio
member.summary: 0.0 - Left, 0.5 - Center, 1.0 - Right.

member.name: T:VL.ImGui.Widgets.SetScrollHereY
member.summary: Adjust scrolling amount to make current cursor position visible.

member.name: P:VL.ImGui.Widgets.SetScrollHereY.Ratio
member.summary: 0.0 - Top, 0.5 - Center, 1.0 - Bottom.

member.name: T:VL.ImGui.Widgets.SetScrollX
member.summary: Set scrolling amount

member.name: T:VL.ImGui.Widgets.SetScrollY
member.summary: Set scrolling amount

member.name: P:VL.ImGui.Widgets.Primitives.BezierCubic.SegmentsCount
member.summary: Use 0 to automatically calculate tessellation (preferred).

member.name: P:VL.ImGui.Widgets.Primitives.BezierQuadratic.SegmentsCount
member.summary: Use 0 to automatically calculate tessellation (preferred).

member.name: P:VL.ImGui.Widgets.Primitives.Quad.IsFilled
member.summary: Filled shapes must always use clockwise winding order. The anti-aliasing fringe depends on it. Counter-clockwise shapes will have "inward" anti-aliasing.

member.name: P:VL.ImGui.Widgets.Primitives.Rect.IsFilled
member.summary: Filled shapes must always use clockwise winding order. The anti-aliasing fringe depends on it. Counter-clockwise shapes will have "inward" anti-aliasing.

member.name: P:VL.ImGui.Widgets.Primitives.Triangle.IsFilled
member.summary: Filled shapes must always use clockwise winding order. The anti-aliasing fringe depends on it. Counter-clockwise shapes will have "inward" anti-aliasing.

member.name: T:VL.ImGui.Widgets.Bullet
member.summary: Draw a small circle + keep the cursor on the same line. Advance cursor x position by GetTreeNodeToLabelSpacing(), same distance that TreeNode() uses

member.name: T:VL.ImGui.Widgets.ArrowButton
member.summary: Square button with an arrow shape

member.name: T:VL.ImGui.Widgets.ButtonSmall
member.summary: Button with FramePadding=(0,0) to easily embed within text

member.name: T:VL.ImGui.Widgets.InvisibleButton
member.summary: Flexible button behavior without the visuals, frequently useful to build custom behaviors using the public api (along with IsItemActive, IsItemHovered, etc.)

member.name: P:VL.ImGui.Widgets.DragWidget`2.Format
member.summary: Adjust format string to decorate the value with a prefix, a suffix, or adapt the editing and display precision e.g. "%.3f" -> 1.234; "%5.2f secs" -> 01.23 secs; "Biscuit: % .0f" -> Biscuit: 1; etc.

member.name: P:VL.ImGui.Widgets.InputFloat.Format
member.summary: Adjust format string to decorate the value with a prefix, a suffix, or adapt the editing and display precision e.g. "%.3f" -> 1.234; "%5.2f secs" -> 01.23 secs; "Biscuit: % .0f" -> Biscuit: 1; etc.

member.name: P:VL.ImGui.Widgets.InputFloat64.Format
member.summary: Adjust format string to decorate the value with a prefix, a suffix, or adapt the editing and display precision e.g. "%.3f" -> 1.234; "%5.2f secs" -> 01.23 secs; "Biscuit: % .0f" -> Biscuit: 1; etc.

member.name: P:VL.ImGui.Widgets.InputVector2.Format
member.summary: Adjust format string to decorate the value with a prefix, a suffix, or adapt the editing and display precision e.g. "%.3f" -> 1.234; "%5.2f secs" -> 01.23 secs; "Biscuit: % .0f" -> Biscuit: 1; etc.

member.name: P:VL.ImGui.Widgets.InputVector3.Format
member.summary: Adjust format string to decorate the value with a prefix, a suffix, or adapt the editing and display precision e.g. "%.3f" -> 1.234; "%5.2f secs" -> 01.23 secs; "Biscuit: % .0f" -> Biscuit: 1; etc.

member.name: P:VL.ImGui.Widgets.InputVector4.Format
member.summary: Adjust format string to decorate the value with a prefix, a suffix, or adapt the editing and display precision e.g. "%.3f" -> 1.234; "%5.2f secs" -> 01.23 secs; "Biscuit: % .0f" -> Biscuit: 1; etc.

member.name: T:VL.ImGui.Widgets.MainMenuBar
member.summary: Create a MenuBar at the top of the screen.

member.name: T:VL.ImGui.Widgets.Menu
member.summary: Create a Menu. You can call Menu multiple time with the same Label to append more items to it.

member.name: T:VL.ImGui.Widgets.MenuBar
member.summary: Create a MenuBar of current window.

member.name: T:VL.ImGui.Widgets.MenuItem
member.summary: Create a MenuItem. Keyboardshortcuts are displayed as a convenience but not processed by Dear ImGui at the moment.

member.name: T:VL.ImGui.Widgets.Modal
member.summary: Modal Popups block normal mouse hovering detection (and therefore most mouse interactions) behind them. They can't be closed by clicking outside of them.

member.name: P:VL.ImGui.Widgets.Modal.HasCloseButton
member.summary: Display a regular close button.

member.name: P:VL.ImGui.Widgets.Modal.Bounds
member.summary: Bounds of the Window.

member.name: P:VL.ImGui.Widgets.Modal.IsOpen
member.summary: Returns true if the Modal Window is open. Set to true to open the Modal Window.

member.name: P:VL.ImGui.Widgets.Modal._IsOpen
member.summary: Returns true if the Modal Window is open.

member.name: P:VL.ImGui.Widgets.Popup.Bounds
member.summary: Bounds of the Window.

member.name: P:VL.ImGui.Widgets.Popup.IsOpen
member.summary: Returns true if the Popup is open. Set to true to open the Popup.

member.name: P:VL.ImGui.Widgets.Popup._IsOpen
member.summary: Returns true if the Popup is open.

member.name: T:VL.ImGui.Widgets.CalcItemWidth
member.summary: Width of item given pushed settings and current cursor position. NOT necessarily the width of last item unlike most 'Item' functions.

member.name: T:VL.ImGui.Widgets.GetContentRegionAvail
member.summary: Retrieve available space from a given point. == GetContentRegionMax() - GetCursorPos()

member.name: T:VL.ImGui.Widgets.GetContentRegionMax
member.summary: Current content boundaries (typically window boundaries including scrolling, or current column boundaries), in windows coordinates

member.name: T:VL.ImGui.Widgets.GetCursorPos
member.summary: Cursor position in window coordinates (relative to window position)

member.name: T:VL.ImGui.Widgets.GetCursorStartPos
member.summary: Initial cursor position in window coordinates

member.name: T:VL.ImGui.Widgets.GetCursorScreenPos
member.summary: Cursor position in absolute coordinates (useful to work with ImDrawList API). generally top-left == GetMainViewport()->Pos == (0,0) in single viewport mode, and bottom-right == GetMainViewport()->Pos+Size == io.DisplaySize in single-viewport mode.

member.name: T:VL.ImGui.Widgets.GetDrawListOffset
member.summary: Cursor position in window coordinates (relative to window position)

member.name: T:VL.ImGui.Widgets.GetFontSize
member.summary: Get current font size (= height in pixels) of current font with current scale applied

member.name: T:VL.ImGui.Widgets.GetFontTexUvWhitePixel
member.summary: Get UV coordinate for a while pixel, useful to draw custom shapes via the ImDrawList API

member.name: T:VL.ImGui.Widgets.GetFrameHeight
member.summary: Approx. FontSize + style.FramePadding.y * 2

member.name: T:VL.ImGui.Widgets.GetFrameHeightWithSpacing
member.summary: Distance in pixels between 2 consecutive lines of framed widgets. Approx. FontSize + style.FramePadding.y * 2 + style.ItemSpacing.y

member.name: T:VL.ImGui.Widgets.GetID
member.summary: Calculate unique ID (hash of whole ID stack + given parameter). e.g. if you want to query into ImGuiStorage yourself

member.name: T:VL.ImGui.Widgets.GetItemRectMax
member.summary: Get lower-right bounding rectangle of the last item (screen space)

member.name: T:VL.ImGui.Widgets.GetItemRectMin
member.summary: Get upper-left bounding rectangle of the last item (screen space)

member.name: T:VL.ImGui.Widgets.GetItemRectSize
member.summary: Get upper-left bounding rectangle of the last item (screen space)

member.name: T:VL.ImGui.Widgets.GetMainViewport
member.summary: Return primary/default viewport.

member.name: T:VL.ImGui.Widgets.GetScroll
member.summary: Get scrolling amount [0 .. GetScrollMax]

member.name: T:VL.ImGui.Widgets.GetScrollMax
member.summary: Get maximum scrolling amount ~~ ContentSize - WindowSize - DecorationsSize

member.name: T:VL.ImGui.Widgets.GetStyle
member.summary: Access the Style structure (colors, sizes).

member.name: T:VL.ImGui.Widgets.StyleSnapshot
member.summary: Immutable copy of all ImGui styles

member.name: T:VL.ImGui.Widgets.GetStyleColorName
member.summary: Get a string corresponding to the enum value (for display, saving, etc.).

member.name: T:VL.ImGui.Widgets.GetStyleColor
member.summary: Retrieve style color as stored in ImGuiStyle structure.

member.name: T:VL.ImGui.Widgets.GetTextLineHeight
member.summary: Approx. = FontSize

member.name: T:VL.ImGui.Widgets.GetTextLineHeightWithSpacing
member.summary: Distance in pixels between 2 consecutive lines of text. Approx. FontSize + style.ItemSpacing.y

member.name: T:VL.ImGui.Widgets.GetTreeNodeToLabelSpacing
member.summary: Horizontal distance preceding label when using TreeNode or Bullet == (g.FontSize + style.FramePadding.x*2) for a regular unframed TreeNode

member.name: T:VL.ImGui.Widgets.IsAnyItemActive
member.summary: Is any item active?

member.name: T:VL.ImGui.Widgets.IsAnyItemFocused
member.summary: Is any item focused?

member.name: T:VL.ImGui.Widgets.IsAnyItemHovered
member.summary: Is any item hovered?

member.name: T:VL.ImGui.Widgets.IsItemActivated
member.summary: Was the last item just made active (item was previously inactive).

member.name: T:VL.ImGui.Widgets.IsItemActive
member.summary: Is the last item active? (e.g. button being held, text field being edited. This will continuously return true while holding mouse button on an item. Items that don't interact will always return false)

member.name: T:VL.ImGui.Widgets.IsItemClicked
member.summary: Is the last item hovered and mouse clicked on?

member.name: T:VL.ImGui.Widgets.IsItemDeactivated
member.summary: Was the last item just made inactive (item was previously active). Useful for Undo/Redo patterns with widgets that requires continuous editing.

member.name: T:VL.ImGui.Widgets.IsItemDeactivatedAfterEdit
member.summary: Was the last item just made inactive and made a value change when it was active? (e.g. Slider/Drag moved). Useful for Undo/Redo patterns with widgets that requires continuous editing. Note that you may get false positives (some widgets such as Combo()/ListBox()/Selectable() will return true even when clicking an already selected item).

member.name: T:VL.ImGui.Widgets.IsItemEdited
member.summary: Did the last item modify its underlying value this frame? or was pressed? This is generally the same as the 'bool' return value of many widgets.

member.name: T:VL.ImGui.Widgets.IsItemFocused
member.summary: Is the last item focused for keyboard/gamepad navigation?

member.name: T:VL.ImGui.Widgets.IsItemHovered
member.summary: Is the last item hovered? (and usable, aka not blocked by a popup, etc.). See ImGuiHoveredFlags for more options.

member.name: T:VL.ImGui.Widgets.IsItemToggledOpen
member.summary: Was the last item open state toggled? set by TreeNode.

member.name: T:VL.ImGui.Widgets.IsItemVisible
member.summary: Is the last item visible? (items may be out of sight because of clipping/scrolling)

member.name: T:VL.ImGui.Widgets.IsPopupOpen
member.summary: Return true if the popup is open at the current BeginPopup() level of the popup stack. With AnyPopupId flag: return true if any popup is open at the current BeginPopup() level of the popup stack. With AnyPopupId + AnyPopupLevel flags: return true if any popup is open.

member.name: T:VL.ImGui.Widgets.GetMouseClickedCount
member.summary: Return the number of successive mouse-clicks at the time where a click happen (otherwise 0).

member.name: T:VL.ImGui.Widgets.GetMousePosOnOpeningCurrentPopup
member.summary: Retrieve mouse position at the time of opening popup.

member.name: T:VL.ImGui.Widgets.IsMouseClicked
member.summary: Did mouse button clicked?

member.name: T:VL.ImGui.Widgets.IsMouseDoubleClicked
member.summary: Did mouse button double-clicked?

member.name: T:VL.ImGui.Widgets.IsMouseDown
member.summary: Is mouse button held?

member.name: T:VL.ImGui.Widgets.IsMouseHoveringRect
member.summary: Is mouse hovering given bounding rect (in screen space). Clipped by current clipping settings, but disregarding of other consideration of focus/window ordering/popup-block.

member.name: T:VL.ImGui.Widgets.IsMouseReleased
member.summary: Did mouse button released?

member.name: T:VL.ImGui.Widgets.TableGetColumnCount
member.summary: Return number of columns (value passed to BeginTable)

member.name: T:VL.ImGui.Widgets.TableGetColumnFlags
member.summary: Return column flags so you can query their Enabled/Visible/Sorted/Hovered status flags.

member.name: P:VL.ImGui.Widgets.TableGetColumnFlags.Index
member.summary: Pass -1 to use current column.

member.name: T:VL.ImGui.Widgets.TableGetColumnIndex
member.summary: Return current column index.

member.name: T:VL.ImGui.Widgets.TableGetColumnName
member.summary: Return '' if column didn't have a name declared by TableSetupColumn().

member.name: P:VL.ImGui.Widgets.TableGetColumnName.Index
member.summary: Pass -1 to use current column.

member.name: T:VL.ImGui.Widgets.TableGetRowIndex
member.summary: Return current row index.

member.name: T:VL.ImGui.Widgets.TableGetSortSpecs
member.summary: Get latest sort specs for the table.

member.name: T:VL.ImGui.Widgets.GetWindowContentRegionMax
member.summary: Content boundaries max for the full window (roughly (0,0)+Size-Scroll) where Size can be override with SetNextWindowContentSize(), in window coordinates

member.name: T:VL.ImGui.Widgets.GetWindowContentRegionMin
member.summary: Content boundaries min for the full window (roughly (0,0)-Scroll), in window coordinates

member.name: T:VL.ImGui.Widgets.GetWindowPos
member.summary: Get current window position in screen space (useful if you want to do your own drawing via the DrawList API)

member.name: T:VL.ImGui.Widgets.GetWindowSize
member.summary: Get current window size

member.name: T:VL.ImGui.Widgets.IsWindowFocused
member.summary: Is current window focused? Or its root/child, depending on flags.

member.name: T:VL.ImGui.Widgets.IsWindowHovered
member.summary: Is current window hovered (and typically: not blocked by a popup/modal)? See flags for options.

member.name: T:VL.ImGui.Widgets.Selectable
member.summary: A selectable highlights when hovered, and can display another color when selected. Neighbors selectable extend their highlight bounds in order to leave no gap between them. This is so a series of selected Selectable appear contiguous.

member.name: T:VL.ImGui.Widgets.Separator
member.summary: Separator, generally horizontal. Inside a menu bar or in horizontal layout mode, this becomes a vertical separator.

member.name: P:VL.ImGui.Widgets.SliderFloat.Format
member.summary: Adjust format string to decorate the value with a prefix, a suffix, or adapt the editing and display precision e.g. "%.3f" -> 1.234; "%5.2f secs" -> 01.23 secs; "Biscuit: % .0f" -> Biscuit: 1; etc.

member.name: P:VL.ImGui.Widgets.SliderFloat64.Format
member.summary: Adjust format string to decorate the value with a prefix, a suffix, or adapt the editing and display precision e.g. "%.3f" -> 1.234; "%5.2f secs" -> 01.23 secs; "Biscuit: % .0f" -> Biscuit: 1; etc.

member.name: P:VL.ImGui.Widgets.SliderFloat64Vertical.Format
member.summary: Adjust format string to decorate the value with a prefix, a suffix, or adapt the editing and display precision e.g. "%.3f" -> 1.234; "%5.2f secs" -> 01.23 secs; "Biscuit: % .0f" -> Biscuit: 1; etc.

member.name: P:VL.ImGui.Widgets.SliderFloatVertical.Format
member.summary: Adjust format string to decorate the value with a prefix, a suffix, or adapt the editing and display precision e.g. "%.3f" -> 1.234; "%5.2f secs" -> 01.23 secs; "Biscuit: % .0f" -> Biscuit: 1; etc.

member.name: P:VL.ImGui.Widgets.SliderVector2.Format
member.summary: Adjust format string to decorate the value with a prefix, a suffix, or adapt the editing and display precision e.g. "%.3f" -> 1.234; "%5.2f secs" -> 01.23 secs; "Biscuit: % .0f" -> Biscuit: 1; etc.

member.name: P:VL.ImGui.Widgets.SliderVector3.Format
member.summary: Adjust format string to decorate the value with a prefix, a suffix, or adapt the editing and display precision e.g. "%.3f" -> 1.234; "%5.2f secs" -> 01.23 secs; "Biscuit: % .0f" -> Biscuit: 1; etc.

member.name: P:VL.ImGui.Widgets.SliderVector4.Format
member.summary: Adjust format string to decorate the value with a prefix, a suffix, or adapt the editing and display precision e.g. "%.3f" -> 1.234; "%5.2f secs" -> 01.23 secs; "Biscuit: % .0f" -> Biscuit: 1; etc.

member.name: P:VL.ImGui.Widgets.TabItem.HasCloseButton
member.summary: Display an additional small close button

member.name: P:VL.ImGui.Widgets.TabItem.IsVisible
member.summary: Returns true if the Tab is displayed. Set to true to display the Tab.

member.name: P:VL.ImGui.Widgets.TabItem._IsVisible
member.summary: Returns true if the Tab is displayed.

member.name: P:VL.ImGui.Widgets.TabItem.IsActive
member.summary: Returns true if the Tab is activated/selected. Set to true to activate the Tab.

member.name: P:VL.ImGui.Widgets.TabItem._IsActive
member.summary: Returns true if the Tab is activated/selected.

member.name: P:VL.ImGui.Widgets.CollapsingHeader.HasCloseButton
member.summary: Display an additional small close button on upper right of the header

member.name: P:VL.ImGui.Widgets.CollapsingHeader.IsVisible
member.summary: Returns true if the header is displayed. Set to true to display the header.

member.name: P:VL.ImGui.Widgets.CollapsingHeader._IsVisible
member.summary: Returns true if the header is displayed.

member.name: P:VL.ImGui.Widgets.CollapsingHeader.IsOpen
member.summary: Returns true if the Header is open (not collapsed). Set to true to open the header.

member.name: P:VL.ImGui.Widgets.CollapsingHeader._IsOpen
member.summary: Returns true if the Header is open (not collapsed).

member.name: P:VL.ImGui.Widgets.TreeNode.IsOpen
member.summary: Returns true if the TreeNode is open (not collapsed). Set to true to open the TreeNode.

member.name: P:VL.ImGui.Widgets.TreeNode._IsOpen
member.summary: Returns true if the TreeNode is open (not collapsed).

member.name: T:VL.ImGui.Widgets.ChildWindow
member.summary: Use child windows to begin into a self-contained independent scrolling/clipping regions within a host window. Child windows can embed their own child.

member.name: P:VL.ImGui.Widgets.ChildWindow.IsOpen
member.summary: Returns true if the Window is open (not fully clipped).

member.name: P:VL.ImGui.Styling.SetAlphaStyle.Alpha
member.summary: Global alpha applies to everything in Dear ImGui.

member.name: P:VL.ImGui.Styling.SetAlphaStyle.DisabledAlpha
member.summary: Additional alpha multiplier. Multiply over current value of Alpha.

member.name: P:VL.ImGui.Styling.SetButtonStyle.TextAlign
member.summary: Alignment of button text when button is larger than text. Defaults to (0.5, 0.5) (centered).

member.name: P:VL.ImGui.Styling.SetChildWindowStyle.Rounding
member.summary: Radius of child window corners rounding. Set to 0.0 to have rectangular windows.

member.name: P:VL.ImGui.Styling.SetChildWindowStyle.BorderSize
member.summary: Thickness of border around child windows. Generally set to 0.0 or 0.01. (Other values are not well tested and more CPU/GPU costly).

member.name: T:VL.ImGui.Styling.SetFrameStyle
member.summary: The style applies to checkboxes, radio buttons, plots, sliders, text inputs

member.name: P:VL.ImGui.Styling.SetFrameStyle.Padding
member.summary: Padding within a framed rectangle (used by most widgets).

member.name: P:VL.ImGui.Styling.SetFrameStyle.Rounding
member.summary: Radius of frame corners rounding. Set to 0.0 to have rectangular frame (used by most widgets).

member.name: P:VL.ImGui.Styling.SetFrameStyle.BorderSize
member.summary: Thickness of border around frames. Generally set to 0.0 or 0.01. (Other values are not well tested and more CPU/GPU costly).

member.name: P:VL.ImGui.Styling.SetGrabStyle.MinSize
member.summary: Minimum width/height of a grab box for slider/scrollbar.

member.name: P:VL.ImGui.Styling.SetGrabStyle.Rounding
member.summary: Radius of grabs corners rounding. Set to 0.0f to have rectangular slider grabs.

member.name: T:VL.ImGui.Styling.SetHeaderStyle
member.summary: Header colors are used for CollapsingHeader, TreeNode, Selectable, MenuItem

member.name: P:VL.ImGui.Styling.SetIndentStyle.Indent
member.summary: Horizontal indentation when e.g. entering a tree node. Generally == (FontSize + FramePadding.x*2).

member.name: T:VL.ImGui.Styling.SetPopupStyle
member.summary: This style applies to popups, menus, tooltips windows.

member.name: P:VL.ImGui.Styling.SetPopupStyle.Background
member.summary: Background of popups, menus, tooltips windows

member.name: P:VL.ImGui.Styling.SetPopupStyle.ModalDimBackground
member.summary: Darken/colorize entire screen behind a modal window, when one is active

member.name: P:VL.ImGui.Styling.SetPopupStyle.Rounding
member.summary: Radius of popup window corners rounding.

member.name: P:VL.ImGui.Styling.SetPopupStyle.BorderSize
member.summary: Thickness of border around popup/tooltip windows. Generally set to 0.0 or 0.01. (Other values are not well tested and more CPU/GPU costly).

member.name: P:VL.ImGui.Styling.SetScrollStyle.ScrollbarSize
member.summary: Width of the vertical scrollbar, Height of the horizontal scrollbar.

member.name: P:VL.ImGui.Styling.SetScrollStyle.GrabRounding
member.summary: Radius of grab corners for scrollbar.

member.name: P:VL.ImGui.Styling.SetSelectableStyle.TextAlign
member.summary: Alignment of selectable text. Defaults to (0.0, 0.0) (top-left aligned). It's generally important to keep this left-aligned if you want to lay multiple items on a same line.

member.name: T:VL.ImGui.Styling.SetSeparatorStyle
member.summary: Separator, generally horizontal. inside a menu bar or in horizontal layout mode, this becomes a vertical separator.

member.name: P:VL.ImGui.Styling.SetSpacingStyle.ItemSpacing
member.summary: Horizontal and vertical spacing between widgets/lines.

member.name: P:VL.ImGui.Styling.SetSpacingStyle.InnerSpacing
member.summary: Horizontal and vertical spacing between within elements of a composed widget (e.g. a slider and its label).

member.name: P:VL.ImGui.Styling.SetTableStyle.RowBackground
member.summary: Table row background (even rows)

member.name: P:VL.ImGui.Styling.SetTableStyle.RowBackgroundAlt
member.summary: Table row background (odd rows)

member.name: P:VL.ImGui.Styling.SetTableStyle.BorderStrongColor
member.summary: Table outer and header borders (prefer using Alpha=1.0 here)

member.name: P:VL.ImGui.Styling.SetTableStyle.BorderLightColor
member.summary: Table inner borders (prefer using Alpha=1.0 here)

member.name: P:VL.ImGui.Styling.SetTableStyle.CellPadding
member.summary: Padding within a table cell.

member.name: T:VL.ImGui.Styling.SetTabStyle
member.summary: The style applies to TabItems in a TabBar.

member.name: P:VL.ImGui.Styling.SetTabStyle.Rounding
member.summary: Radius of upper corners of a tab. Set to 0.0 to have rectangular tabs.

member.name: P:VL.ImGui.Styling.SetWindowStyle.ResizeGripColor
member.summary: Color of the Resize grip in lower-right and lower-left corners of windows.

member.name: P:VL.ImGui.Styling.SetWindowStyle.ResizeGripHovered
member.summary: Hovered Color of the Resize grip.

member.name: P:VL.ImGui.Styling.SetWindowStyle.ResizeGripActive
member.summary: Active Color of the Resize grip.

member.name: P:VL.ImGui.Styling.SetWindowStyle.MinSize
member.summary: Minimum window size.

member.name: P:VL.ImGui.Styling.SetWindowStyle.Padding
member.summary: Padding within a window.

member.name: P:VL.ImGui.Styling.SetWindowStyle.Rounding
member.summary: Radius of window corners rounding. Set to 0.0 to have rectangular windows. Large values tend to lead to variety of artifacts and are not recommended.

member.name: P:VL.ImGui.Styling.SetWindowStyle.BorderSize
member.summary: Thickness of border around windows. Generally set to 0.0 or 0.01. (Other values are not well tested and more CPU/GPU costly).

member.name: P:VL.ImGui.Windows.WindowCore.Bounds
member.summary: Bounds of the Window.

members.member:
Returns true if the Window is visible. Returns false if the close button is clicked.
It is not a channel, because it can't be used to set visibility of the window. https://github.com/ocornut/imgui/blob/5bb287494096461f90eb5d18135f7c4809efd2f5/imgui.h#L320

member.name: P:VL.ImGui.Windows.WindowCore.IsOpen
member.summary: Returns true if the Window is open (not collapsed or clipped). Set to true to open the window.

member.name: P:VL.ImGui.Windows.WindowCore._IsOpen
